Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Ali al-Ridha
Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Also known as Imam Ali al-Ridha. He was the eighth Shia Imam.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Ibrahim ibn Musa
Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Known as Ibrahim al-Murtadha. He was a prominent religious figure.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Abbas ibn Musa

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Fatimah bint Musa
Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Also known as Fatimah al-Masumah. She is buried in Qom, Iran.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Muhammad ibn Musa
Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Little is known about his life.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.name: Ahmad ibn Musa
Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Known as Shah Cheragh. He is buried in Shiraz, Iran.

Musa_al-Kadhim_children.notes: Little is known about his life.
